title: Intro to Population Data Science
text:
Welcome to the Population Research Centerâ€™s course on Population Data Science, taught by NicolÃ¡s Sacco at Portland State University.



This course introduces computational and statistical approaches to understanding population change.
We combine demographic theory with data science tools (R, Quarto, GitHub) to analyze fertility, mortality, migration, and spatial patterns.





Understand and evaluate population data sources

Learn to clean, analyze, and visualize demographic data

Apply reproducible workflows for demographic research

Build a final applied project integrating all skills








Module
Topic
Format




1
Introduction
Lecture


2
Population Data Sources
Workshop


3
R Basics
Lab


4
Demographic Data Analysis
Practice


5
Spatial Demography
Mapping


6
Final Projects
Presentations
